  1. com.amilesend.onedrive.connection.auth.oauth

Uses of Package
com.amilesend.onedrive.connection.auth.oauth

Packages that use com.amilesend.onedrive.connection.auth.oauth
Package
Description
com.amilesend.onedrive.connection.auth.oauth
 
  • Classes in com.amilesend.onedrive.connection.auth.oauth used by com.amilesend.onedrive.connection.auth.oauth
    Class
    Description
    OAuthReceiver
    A customized OAuth receiver that handles the OAuth token exchange redirect by hosting a HTTP server to capture the auth and/or error code specific to Box.net OAuth flow.
    OAuthReceiver.OAuthReceiverBuilder
     
    OAuthReceiverCallback
    HttpServer handler that takes the verifier token passed over from the OAuth provider and stashes it where OAuthReceiver.waitForCode() will find it.
    OAuthReceiverCallback.OAuthReceiverCallbackBuilder
     
    OAuthReceiverException
    Defines the exception thrown from OAuthReceiver.
    OneDriveOAuthReceiver
    Extends OAuthReceiver that accounts for MS Graph scopes and client ID in order to provide the URI to query for the auth code during the OAUTH exchange.
    OneDriveOAuthReceiver.OneDriveOAuthReceiverBuilder
